00093         void turnAbsolute(double goalHeading)
00094         {
00095                 //this->goalHeading = goalHeading;
00096                 if (ordersQueue)
00097                         ordersQueue->add("boat_turn_absolute", toStr(id),
00098                                          toStr(goalHeading));
00099         }
00103         void stopTurning()
00104         {
00105                 //goalHeading = heading;
00106                 if (ordersQueue)
00107                         ordersQueue->add("boat_stop_turning", toStr(id));
00108         }

00115         {
00116                 //this->goalVelocity = goalVelocity;
00117                 if (ordersQueue)
00118                         ordersQueue->add("boat_velocity", toStr(id),
00119                                          toStr(goalVelocity));
00120         }

00190         {
00191                 if (ordersQueue)
00192                         // Command name stays the same as in the base class
00193                         ordersQueue->add("boat_load", toStr(id), toStr(amount));
00194         }
00195

00202         {
00203                 if (ordersQueue)
